page.title: 08Law and Order
page.content: 1As the area hes grown in size, so hes the{crime rate}.Where one policeman was on a 24 hour shift, 7 days a week in 1905, it takes at least a score more today,policing a wider area. The most common crimes are theft and vandalism but{drugs}involvement is changing the whole outlook of police work. Policemen are back to walking the beat and are doing so singly, not in pairs, by order of the Chief Constable. Policemen would like more involvement with the public as they strive to keep{law and order. {Attitudes}on a random sample survey-80.04%found the police helpful;13.34% did not know. 86.7% wanted more policemen walking their beat. The biggest increase in crime was seen as{vandalism} 60%,violence 20% and theft 20%
